`,(0,o.jsxDEV)(t.p,{children:"\uC54C\uC544\uB0B8 \uC774 \uB450\uAC00\uC9C0 \uC0AC\uC2E4\uB85C \uAE08\uBC29 \uD480\uC774\uD560 \uC218 \uC788\uC5C8\uB2E4."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/songhaeun/Desktop/dev/my-blog/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-f9de8205-2012-461a-8f78-6c35bcf6efee.mdx",lineNumber:55,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,o.jsxDEV)(t.pre,{children:(0,o.jsxDEV)(t.code,{children:`

const fs = require("fs");
const fileContent = fs.readFileSync(0).toString().trim().split("\\n");

const edgeNum = Number(fileContent[0]);
const edges = fileContent.slice(1, edgeNum);
const queries = fileContent.slice(edgeNum + 1);

const graph = Array.from({ length: edgeNum + 1 }, () => []);
edges.forEach((edge) => {
const [from, to] = edge.split(" ").map(Number);
graph[from].push(to);
graph[to].push(from);
});

let result = "";
queries.forEach((query) => {
const [t, k] = query.split(" ").map(Number);
if (t === 1) {
result += graph[k].length > 1 ? "yes\\n" : "no\\n";
} else {
result += "yes\\n";
}
});

console.log(result);


`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/songhaeun/Desktop/dev/my-blog/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-f9de8205-2012-461a-8f78-6c35bcf6efee.mdx",lineNumber:57,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/songhaeun/Desktop/dev/my-blog/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-f9de8205-2012-461a-8f78-6c35bcf6efee.mdx",lineNumber:57,columnNumber:1},this),`
